Spark your imagination

Almost everything is possible in games and software and it's our goal to try and reach new limits! Whether it's for entertainment or more serious purposes, we are always ready for the next challenge.

Services

Who are we?

We are a small flexible team of developers and artists with a passion to make games and software. Not only the final product is our focus, but we also highly value the way we get there. To accomplish this we work in short development cycles to ensure that the product is always moving in the right direction. At each step of the way we make sure that the right professional is on the job.

Jazzhands

An application for jazzing your hands.

Developer: CeroFlux & Shellpad Interactive

Release Date: TBA

Engine: Unity

Language: C#

Description
A base application for AR and VR that makes it possible so the user can use their hands to interact with objects inside of the virtual world. No need for expensive controllers of the HTV Vive or Oculus Rift, but just your own hands.

Goals
We would like to offer an easy to use library for developers to use in their applications. Jazzhands will allow users to use their hands as controllers in VR & AR applications on their phones. Our vision is to create a market for users who do not have the money for expensive VR & AR systems, but do want to experience what it is like to use those systems. Building on cheap solutions like the Google Cardboard we offer additional functionality to use your hands in the applications you use.

Timebenders

An online PvP time bending game, rewind time until the rewinding never happened!

Developer: Oogbaard

Release Date: TBA

Engine: Unity

Language: C#

Powerful mages fight head on to gain total control over space and time to overcome the enemy! Make a mistake and manipulate time to increase your chances to stay alive and lower theirs. Prepare for the future, but more importantly don't forget about the past!

Fingeringmoma

A funny mobile game where you use your finger to flick balls across the screen.

Developer: CeroFlux & Shellpad Interactive

Release Date: TBA

Engine: Unity

Language: C#

Flick balls across the house with this interactive finger simulator! With the intense power of just a single finger try to get a score as high as possible or do tricks to impress all your friends!
